author: Minifig290
title: Business Master To Golfer?
review:
Hello All, A few days ago I was able to get the LEGO Movie Two Minifigures and one of those characters i got included Gone Golfing President Business, each minifigure packets retail for £2.99 or $3.99 and released February 1st officially, President Business has 6 parts including base plate giving him a Price Per Part of 49p/66c. Lets look at the accessory first.

Accessory

Gone Golfing President Business has a golfing club as his accessory using a new pearl silver club piece that has a minifigure sized bar at the top then gets thinner as it get t the head of the club where there is a few indents., sadly no piece to represent a golf ball.

All 20 figures in this series including President Business has a new white minifigure base plate that thankfully has no print.

Minifigure

President Business has a casual older outfit with a sand green torso that has a diamond white and dark green pattern with a white button up shirt underneath. He has dual molded white arms. His dual molded dark green and tan legs have a checkered print on the tan part plus a belt on the hip ad the dark green section has some black shoe print.

In 2014 The LEGO Movie introduced Presidents Business's blocky dark orange and tan hair that has thankfully been re-released in this figure. Mr Business has a double sided head that has one expression showing happiness with wide eyes and a cheery mouth, while on the other side he has a more concentrated face print with focused eyes and mouth expression.

___________________________________________________________________________

Overall

Now this is my favorite of the 16 LEGO Movie figure in the series, so not including the 4 Wizard Of Oz characters. I love his great printing on his outfit and the new golf club is excellent plus the re-release of his popular quirky hair is very welcome by many.

Now Gone Golfin President Business is a great figure to get if you are considering to buy on or two packs as he has new parts and prints and makes the £3/$4 price seem slightly reasonable.

Pros - Great printing, nice new golf club, welcome re-release of his blocky hair.

Cons - None To Mention

author: Odeinoichus
title: Honey, I'm Goin' Golfin'!
review:
Set #71023 Gone Golfin' President Business: This character was woefully underused in the Sequel, his entire presence was nothing more than a one-off joke/gag, leaving us with this brilliantly design Minifigure. But it might have been nice if we got a little more Will Ferrel in this film.

Dressed to the nines in classic golfing attire, President Business is only missing the funny little hat some golfers wear. He's got a very nice sweater design with diamon patterns, an impressive design for Golfing pants with dual-moulding to enhance the deliciously 'Dad' like print. He has equally fun expressions, with one side being open-mouthed smiling and the other looking like he's laughing awkwardly at some bad joke. And of course he has the putter, an excellent new accessory from LEGO sporting goods providers. Octan. It's always Octan. Er, not that this club has any Octan logos on it or anything like that.

Overall a decent enough Minifigure, very solid middle of the road look and feel. Recommended.
